(un)Wrapping TikTok's User Data
  • Section 1 - Introduction & Motivation
  • Section 2 - User Data Downloads
  • Contact

Section 1 - Introduction & Motivation

This project supports the work being done for MIMS Capstone Project, Algorithms Unwrapped.

Algorithms Unwrapped is a machine learning education tool to help social media users better understand their own algorithmic content feeds so that they can learn how the algorithm sees them, and reflect on what they really want out of their algorithmic content recommendations.

For this project, we focus on one case study of someone's data to show how their viewing activity is used to feed certain ad recommendations and also suggest other videos, usually on a user's "For You" page.

Images from Screenshots of TikTok app, iDownloadblog, Gadget Hacks

Section 2 - User Data Downloads

Getting our digital profile.

Before one can understand how social media like TikTok affects someone's data, they would need to know the data that make up their digital profile. TikTok does allow us to download a majority of the data that they have on us and then we can get a guess of the digital profile they have on users.

Section 3 - What can we find out about what TikTok knows about us?
